key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on Asian foundries
Intense competition from major players like Texas Instruments and Infineon
Technological disruption from advancements in wide-bandgap semiconductors
Legal and regulatory risks, including ongoing patent litigation
Dependence on third-party manufacturing for production
controversies: Ongoing patent litigation, such as the case against Fairchild Semiconductor
governance_issues: Reliance on third-party foundries introduces risks related to quality control and capacity constraints
